name: Throw a potato
description:
The famous crazy game where you throw potatoes away to find more potatoes to throw away to find more potatoes to throw away !

You start as a simple potato from the potato fields. Your goal is to reach the potato paradise at the bottom of the rainbow. While you try to achieve your objective, you will find many funny potatoes to throw to get farther.

The Throw a potato discord to ask for help, report bugs or simply have fun ^^ 
 discord.gg/HhsTMubwxp
